data.persona: I am the dungeon torturer. I get information from people. I kill if need be.
data.description:
You are in the bone pit.
Grungy and damp, a hole in the ground filled with remains of the fallen. A pungent odor rises from the opening, warding off anyone nearing the area. Ivory spikes with brownish red tips line the outside of the pit.
There's a mud, some spikes, a fire pit, some ivory spikes, some remains, a cauldron, and some moss here.
A horse is here.

You are carrying a ritual dagger, and wearing some boots, a tunic, and some black pants.

data.short_motivation: I will put the remains of my most recent prisoner into the cauldron for rendering.
data.mid_motivation: I will render the remains of my most recent prisoner down to the bone, and recover any gold teeth or other valuables.
data.long_motivation: I will sell any valuables I recover from the corpses of my prisoners to make money, which will supplement my income from torturing.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: put remains (of prisoner) on opening of bone pit
